segments.text: Just look at this mess; itâ€™s absolutely appalling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, soaking the cabinets and spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to cause so much damage, swelling the wood and ruining the finish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the mildew and the permanent stains.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the fact that the woman is standing in it, totally unaware, is just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot must be cold and wet, yet she carries on as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of neglect is truly astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's antics only add to the potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, the boy could fall into the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for a truly miserable afternoon cleanup, or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels unsettling and quite unhygienic with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could mop it all up right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
